title: Large-Scale Metaphor-Based Discourse Analysis Workshop for Integrating Instructional and Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience in instructional design and learning design within mathematics education contexts
context.additional_context: A program where in-service secondary mathematics teachers explore the differences between instructional design (ID) and learning design (LD) through metaphors and engage in collaborative design activities in a VR environment

learning_goals: Participants can explain three core philosophical differences between Instructional Design (ID) and Learning Design (LD) using metaphor-based discussions
Participants can design an integrated space for both approaches in a VR simulation using Van Goghâ€™s "The Yellow House" metaphor
Participants can improve a mathematics lesson design plan into two versions incorporating peer feedback through formative assessment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
